Name: PARID
Description: PARID Key uniquely identifies each assessment record. This field is a combination of Boro, Block, Lot, Easement & Sub-ID (only record type 3 properties have a sub-id all other record types will have 10 blanks at the end of the field)

Name: BORO
Description: Borough. Borough Codes: 1 = Manhattan; 2 = Bronx; 3 = Brooklyn; 4 = Queens; 5 = Staten Island

Name: BLOCK
Description: Valid Block Ranges:  Manhattan: 1 to 2255; Bronx: 2260 to 5958; Brooklyn: 1 to 8955; Queens: 1 to 16350; Staten Island: 1 to 8050

Name: LOT
Description: Unique number within BORO/BLOCK

Name: EASEMENT
Description: Valid Easement Codes: Blank = No Easement; A = Air Rights; B = Non-Air Rights; E = Land Easement; F thru M = Used when property has more than one easements; N = Non-Transit; P = Piers; R = Railroads; S = Street; U = U.S. Government

Name: SUBIDENT_REUC
Description: REUC only (Rectype  = 2 or 3)

Name: RECTYPE
Description: Record Type: 1 = ORE; 2 = REUC Ident; 3 = REUC Sub Ident

Name: YEAR
Description: Four digit year

Name: IDENT
Description: REUC only (Rectype = 2 or 3)

Name: ROLL_SECTION
Description: REUC only (Rectype = 2 or 3)

Name: SECVOL
Description: Section Volume Number (2 Digits each). Manhattan: 1-1 to 8-04; Bronx: 9-1 to 19-06; Brooklyn: 1-1 to 26-05; Queens: 1-1 to 63-03; Staten Island: 1-1 to 32-03

Name: PYMKTLAND
Description: Market Assessed Land Value. Values as of the Final Roll for the Previous Tax Year.

Name: PYMKTTOT
Description: Market Assessed Total Value. Values as of the Final Roll for the Previous Tax Year.

Name: PYACTLAND
Description: Actual Assessed Land Value. Values as of the Final Roll for the Previous Tax Year.

Name: PYACTTOT
Description: Actual Assessed Total Value. Values as of the Final Roll for the Previous Tax Year.

Name: PYACTEXTOT
Description: Actual Exemption Total Value. Values as of the Final Roll for the Previous Tax Year.

Name: PYTRNLAND
Description: Transitional Assessed Land Value. Values as of the Final Roll for the Previous Tax Year.

Name: PYTRNTOT
Description: Transitional Assessed Total Value. Values as of the Final Roll for the Previous Tax Year.

Name: PYTRNEXTOT
Description: Transitional Exemption Total Value. Values as of the Final Roll for the Previous Tax Year.

Name: PYTXBTOT
Description: Taxable Assessed Total. Values as of the Final Roll for the Previous Tax Year .

Name: PYTXBEXTOT
Description: Taxable Exemption Total. Values as of the Final Roll for the Previous Tax Year .

Name: PYTAXCLASS
Description: Property Tax Class. Values as of the Final Roll for the Previous Tax Year .

Name: TENMKTLAND
Description: Tentative Market Assessed Land Value . Values as of the publishing of the Tentative Assessment Roll in January.

Name: TENMKTTOT
Description: Tentative Market Assessed Total Value. Values as of the publishing of the Tentative Assessment Roll in January.

Name: TENACTLAND
Description: Tentative Actual Assessed Land Value. Values as of the publishing of the Tentative Assessment Roll in January.

Name: TENACTTOT
Description: Tentative Actual Assessed Total Value. Values as of the publishing of the Tentative Assessment Roll in January.

Name: TENACTEXTOT
Description: Tentative Actual Exemption Total Value. Values as of the publishing of the Tentative Assessment Roll in January.

Name: TENTRNLAND
Description: Tentative Transitional Assessed Land Value. Values as of the publishing of the Tentative Assessment Roll in January.

Name: TENTRNTOT
Description: Tentative Transitional Assessed Total Value. Values as of the publishing of the Tentative Assessment Roll in January.

Name: TENTRNEXTOT
Description: Tentative Transitional Exemption Total Value. Values as of the publishing of the Tentative Assessment Roll in January.

Name: TENTXBTOT
Description: Tentative Taxable Assessed Total. Values as of the publishing of the Tentative Assessment Roll in January.

Name: TENTXBEXTOT
Description: Tentative Taxable Exemption Total. Values as of the publishing of the Tentative Assessment Roll in January.

Name: TENTAXCLASS
Description: Property Tax Class. Values as of the publishing of the Tentative Assessment Roll in January.

Name: CBNMKTLAND
Description: Change By Notice Market Assessed Land Value. Values as of the  Change By Notice period in May.

Name: CBNMKTTOT
Description: Change By Notice Market Assessed Total Value. Values as of the  Change By Notice period in May.

Name: CBNACTLAND
Description: Change By Notice Actual Assessed Land Value. Values as of the  Change By Notice period in May.

Name: CBNACTTOT
Description: Change By Notice Actual Assessed Total Value. Values as of the  Change By Notice period in May.

Name: CBNACTEXTOT
Description: Change By Notice Actual Exemption Total Value. Values as of the  Change By Notice period in May.

Name: CBNTRNTLAND
Description: Change By Notice Transitional Assessed Land Value. Values as of the  Change By Notice period in May.

Name: CBNTRNTOT
Description: Change By Notice Transitional Assessed Total Value. Values as of the  Change By Notice period in May.

Name: CBNTRNEXTOT
Description: Change By Notice Transitional Exemption Total Value. Values as of the  Change By Notice period in May.

Name: CBNTXBTOT
Description: Change By Notice Taxable Assessed Total Value. Values as of the  Change By Notice period in May.

Name: CBNTXBEXTOT
Description: Change By Notice Taxable Exemption Total Value. Values as of the  Change By Notice period in May.

Name: CBNTAXCLASS
Description: Property Tax Class. Values as of the  Change By Notice period in May.

Name: FINMKTLAND
Description: Final Market Assessed Land Value. Values as of the publishing of the Final Assessment Roll in May.

Name: FINMKTTOT
Description: Final Market Assessed Total Value. Values as of the publishing of the Final Assessment Roll in May.

Name: FINACTLAND
Description: Final Actual Assessed Land Value. Values as of the publishing of the Final Assessment Roll in May.

Name: FINACTTOT
Description: Final Actual Assessed Total Value. Values as of the publishing of the Final Assessment Roll in May.

Name: FINACTEXTOT
Description: Final Actual Exemption Total Value . Values as of the publishing of the Final Assessment Roll in May.

Name: FINTRNLAND
Description: Final Transitional Assessed Land Value. Values as of the publishing of the Final Assessment Roll in May.

Name: FINTRNTOT
Description: Final Transitional Assessed Total Value. Values as of the publishing of the Final Assessment Roll in May.

Name: FINTRNEXTOT
Description: Final Transitional Exemption Total Value. Values as of the publishing of the Final Assessment Roll in May.

Name: FINTXBTOT
Description: Final Taxable Assessed Total Value. Values as of the publishing of the Final Assessment Roll in May.

Name: FINTXBEXTOT
Description: Final Taxable Exemption Total Value. Values as of the publishing of the Final Assessment Roll in May.

Name: FINTAXCLASS
Description: Property Tax Class. Values as of the publishing of the Final Assessment Roll in May.

Name: CURMKTLAND
Description: Current Market Assessed Land Value. Most current Values for this property.

Name: CURMKTTOT
Description: Current Market Assessed Total Value. Most current Values for this property.

Name: CURACTLAND
Description: Current Actual Assessed Land Value. Most current Values for this property.

Name: CURACTTOT
Description: Current Actual Assessed Total Value. Most current Values for this property.

Name: CURACTEXTOT
Description: Current Actual Exemption Total Value. Most current Values for this property.

Name: CURTRNLAND
Description: Current Transitional Assessed Land Value. Most current Values for this property.

Name: CURTRNTOT
Description: Current Transitional Assessed Total Value. Most current Values for this property.

Name: CURTRNEXTOT
Description: Current Transitional Exemption Total Value. Most current Values for this property.

Name: CURTXBTOT
Description: Current Taxable Assessed Total Value. Most current Values for this property.

Name: CURTXBEXTOT
Description: Current Taxable Exemption Total Value. Most current Values for this property.

Name: CURTAXCLASS
Description: Property Tax Class. Most current Values for this property.

Name: PERIOD
Description: Field values are as follows: 0 =  Starting value for the new Assessment Year (only the prior year fields should have values); 1 = Tentative Roll has been published (Prior Year and Tentative fields have values); 2 = Change by Notice Period has ended (Prior Year, Tentative and CBN fields have values); 3 = Final Roll has been published (Prior Year, Tentative, CBN and final fields have values); 4 = A Remission has been entered for this property (either AV or EX)

Name: NEWDROP
Description: Indicates that the lot will be dropped at the end of the fiscal year (1 = New lot (The drop lot indicator will be updated later))

Name: NOAV
Description: A building in progress (1 = A building in progress)

Name: VALREF
Description: The parcel's values are reflected in another lot (Y  = The parcel's values are reflected in another lot)

Name: BLDG_CLASS
Description: Building Class. There is a direct correlation between the Building Class and the Tax Class.

Name: OWNER
Description: Owner's Name. Primary Owner of the property.

Name: ZONING
Description: Zoning code from NYC Department of City Planning

Name: HOUSENUM_LO
Description: The lowest house number of the property

Name: HOUSENUM_HI
Description: The highest house number of the property

Name: STREET_NAME
Description: Street Name for the property

Name: ZIP_CODE
Description: Postal Zip code for the property

Name: GEOSUPPORT_RC
Description: Status of the address data verification from Geosupport. (Blank = No Geosupport processing attempted; 00 = Verified by Geosupport; All other values  = Geosupport exception existed)

Name: STCODE
Description: Street Code. 10 Digit street code prefaced by borough code.

Name: LOT_FRT
Description: Lot Frontage in feet

Name: LOT_DEP
Description: Lot Depth in feet

Name: LOR_IRREG
Description: Irregular shaped lot (1 = Irregularly shaped lot)

Name: BLD_FRT
Description: Building Frontage in feet

Name: BLD_DEP
Description: Building Depth in feet

Name: BLD_EXT
Description: Extension (E = Extension; G = Garage; EG = Extension and Garage)

Name: BLD_STORY
Description: The number of stories/floors for the building

Name: CORNER
Description: The code to indicate a corner lot on two streets (VALUES: 'NE', 'NW', 'SE', 'SW' & 'CR')

Name: LAND_AREA
Description: Total Land Area (If not 0, Total Land Area)

Name: NUM_BLDG
Description: The Number of Buildings on the property

Name: YRBUILT
Description: The year the building was constructed

Name: YRBUILT_RANGE
Description: The last year of the range. If built over several years, this last year of the range. Otherwise it is 0.

Name: YRBUILT_FLAG
Description: Year Built is an estimate (E = Year Built is an estimate)

Name: YRALT1
Description: Year of alteration. If building was altered, this is year of alteration.

Name: YRALT1_RANGE
Description: Last year of the alteration. If alteration took more than 1 year, this is the last year of the alteration.

Name: YRALT2
Description: Year of second alteration. If building class was altered twice, this is year of second alteration.

Name: YRALT2_RANGE
Description: Last year of the second alteration. If 2nd alteration took more than 1 year, this is last year of the alteration.

Name: COOP_APT
Description: Number of residential units.

Name: REUC_REF
Description: Contains the ident number (alpha/numeric) for REUC properties. Contains the ident number (alpha/numeric) for REUC properties (Real Estate of Utility Corporations Tax Class 3 only)

Name: APTNO
Description: Apartment Number for condominium properties

Name: COOP_NUM
Description: Coop identification number

Name: CPB_BORO
Description: Borough code (1 - 5) for the community planning board.

Name: CPB_DIST
Description: Community planning board number

Name: APPT_DATE
Description: Date of the most recent apportionment

Name: APPT_BORO
Description: Apportionment Borough

Name: APPT_BLOCK
Description: Apportionment Block

Name: APPT_LOT
Description: Apportionment Lot

Name: APPT_EASE
Description: Apportionment Easement

Name: CONDO_Number
Description: Condo identification number

Name: CONDO_SFX1
Description: C = Commercial unit; R= Residential; Blank = Entire condo is either all residential or all commercial

Name: CONDO_SFX2
Description: Suffix 1 sequence number

Name: CONDO_SFX3
Description: Not Used

Name: UAF_LAND
Description: Land percent of common interest in the entire condo

Name: UAF_BLDG
Description: Building percent of common interest in the condo

Name: PROTEST_1
Description: Protest code (3 characters field): 1st character 1 = form TC101 (generally for classes 2 and 4); 5 = form TC105 (REUC); 6 = form TC106 ( reclass); 8 = form TC108 (class 1 ); 9 = form TC109 (condos); 2nd character indicates duplicate; 3rd character not used

Name: PROTEST_2
Description: Indicates a second protest on the property. Same Protest Codes.

Name: PROTEST_OLD
Description: Same codes as the protest indicator. Same Protest Codes.

Name: ATTORNEY_GROUP1
Description: Protest Attorney identification number

Name: ATTORNEY_GROUP2
Description: Protest Attorney identification number

Name: ATTORNEY_GROUP_OLD
Description: Protest Attorney identification number

Name: GROSS_SQFT
Description: Gross Square Footage of the building

Name: HOTEL_AREA_GROSS
Description: Hotel Area Gross Square Footage

Name: OFFICE_AREA_GROSS
Description: Office Area Gross Square Footage

Name: RESIDENTIAL_AREA_GROSS
Description: Residential Area Gross Square Footage

Name: RETAIL_AREA_GROSS
Description: Retail Area Gross Square Footage

Name: LOFT_AREA_GROSS
Description: Loft Area Gross Square Footage

Name: FACTORY_AREA_GROSS
Description: Factory Area Gross Square Footage

Name: WAREHOUSE_AREA_GROSS
Description: Warehouse Area Gross Square Footage

Name: STORAGE_AREA_GROSS
Description: Storage Area Gross Square Footage

Name: GARAGE_AREA
Description: Garage Area Gross Square Footage

Name: OTHER_AREA_GROSS
Description: Other Area Gross Square Footage

Name: REUC_DESCRIPTION
Description: REUC Description

Name: EXTRACTDT
Description: Data extract date. Format is YYYYMMDD.

Name: PYTAXFLAG
Description: Taxable Flag ('T' = Taxable,  'A' = Actual or blank)

Name: TENTAXFLAG
Description: Tentative Taxable Flag ('T' = Taxable,  'A' = Actual or blank)

Name: CBNTAXFLAG
Description: Change By Notice Taxable Flag ('T' = Taxable,  'A' = Actual or blank)

Name: FINTAXFLAG
Description: Final Taxable Flag ('T' = Taxable,  'A' = Actual or blank)

Name: CURTAXFLAG
Description: Current Taxable Flag ('T' = Taxable,  'A' = Actual or blank)
